TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscreteInt16KeyFrame extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame

summary.span: 使用离散插值将上一个关键帧的 值动画应用到其自身的 。

span.span: Animates from the value of the previous key frame to its own using discrete interpolation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用作与 结合 ，以对 一组关键帧中的属性值进行动画处理。This class is used as part of a in conjunction with a to animate a property value along a set of key frames. 关键帧定义 其所属的段。A key frame defines a segment of the to which it belongs. 每个关键帧都有一个目标 和 。Each key frame has a target and a . 指定应到达关键帧的时间 。The specifies the time at which the key frame's should be reached. 关键帧将从前一个关键帧的目标值动画处理到其自身的目标值。A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value. 它在上一个关键帧结束时开始，并在达到其自己的密钥时间时结束。It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached. 离散关键帧（如 create 突然 "跳转"）在值之间 (没有内插) 。Discrete key frames like create sudden "jumps" between values (no interpolation). 换言之，动画的属性在到达关键帧的关键时间之前不会发生变化，此时，动画属性将突然进入目标值。In other words, the animated property does not change until the key frame's key time is reached, at which point the animated property goes suddenly to the target value. ## Examples 动画的内插对动画在其持续时间内在值之间进行过渡的方式进行了描述。An animation's interpolation describes how an animation transitions between values over its duration. 通过选择动画要使用哪种关键帧类型，可以定义该关键帧段的内插方法。By selecting which key frame type you use with your animation, you can define the interpolation method for that key frame segment. 有三种不同类型的内插方法：线性、离散和曲线。There are three different types of interpolation methods: linear, discrete, and splined. 此示例使用 来演示这些内插类型。This example uses a to demonstrate these interpolation types. 下面的示例使用类提供的每个不同的内插方法 对的位置进行动画处理 。The following example uses each of the different interpolation methods available to the class to animate the position of a . 1. 在前三秒内，使用类的实例 将矩形沿路径以稳定速率从其起始位置移动到500位置。During the first three seconds, uses an instance of the class to move the rectangle along a path at a steady rate from its starting position to the 500 position. 线性关键帧，如在 值之间创建平滑线性过渡。Linear key frames like create a smooth linear transition between values. 2. 在第四秒结束时，使用类的实例将 矩形突然移动到下一个位置。At the end of the fourth second, uses an instance of the class to suddenly move the rectangle to the next position. 离散关键帧（如 create 突然跨值）。Discrete key frames like create sudden jumps between values. 在该示例中，矩形位于起始位置，然后突然出现在 500 位置。In this example, the rectangle is at the starting position and then suddenly appears at the 500 position. 3. 在最后两秒内，使用类的实例 将矩形移回其起始位置。In the final two seconds, uses an instance of the class to move the rectangle back to its starting position. 样条关键帧 ，如根据属性的值创建值之间的变量转换 。Spline key frames like create a variable transition between values according to the value of the property. 在此示例中，矩形的开始方向缓慢，然后以指数方式加速，直到时间段结束In this example, the rectangle begins by moving slowly and then speeds up exponentially toward the end of the time segment [!code-csharp[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/CSharp/AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.cs#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] [!code-vb[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/visualbasic/altdoubleanimationusingkeyframesexample.vb#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] [!code-xaml[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/XAML/AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.xaml#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] 并非每个 \ AnimationUsingKeyFrames 类都支持所有内插方法。Not every \AnimationUsingKeyFrames class supports all interpolation methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [关键帧动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview)。For more information, see the [Key-Frame Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview).

protected override short InterpolateValueCore (short baseValue, double keyFrameProgress);

protected: override short InterpolateValueCore(short baseValue, double keyFrameProgress);

param.name: keyFrameProgress
param.span: 一个介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值，该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

span.span: A value from 0.0 through 1.0 that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.

summary.span: 使用离散内插可在前一个关键帧值和当前关键帧的值之间进行切换。

span.span: Uses discrete interpolation to transition between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame.

returns.span: 给定了指定基值和进度时此关键帧的输出值。

span.span: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
